Oct. 5, 1907 D Abergavenny Contest
Abergavenny Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Abergavenny Contest abergavenny-contest
Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
Abergavenny, Monmouthshire, Wales, UK 5 bands competed
In addition there was a Grand Waltzing Competition - the "novelty of the season" - "Waltzing with Julia"
April 7, 2012, 5:37 p.m. Nov. 28, 2019, 1:24 p.m.
